Summer School

GeoComputation using free and open source software

(basic and advanced levels)

Matera 19 – 23 June 2017

The International Summer School on Geocomputation using free and open source software is an immersion 5 day experience opening new horizon on the use of the outstanding power of the Linux environment and the command line approach to process geospatial data
